transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan
Executive: Ya haan ji sir good morning Santika baat kar rahe IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan ji sir yaha pe aapne buylead ka feedback diya tha na wrong buylead mein.
Customer: Wrong buylead bola?
Executive: Aapne buylead mein wrong buylead not relevant mark kiya tha usme select kiya tha option wrong buylead.
Customer: Wrong buylead ho gaya sab.
Executive: Haan sara aapne wrong buylead kar diya hai sir.
Customer: To phir kya karna padega pata hi nahi chal raha hai isliye koi call nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Sir abhi to aapki service li hui kitni din hui hai aapke paas.
Customer: Eh eh che saat din hua hoga.
Executive: Abhi start hi hui hai na sir to thoda sa time lagta hai cheezo ko visibility ko time badhne mein aapke paas inquiry to ja rahi hai buyleads bhi ja raha hai but aapne jo buyleads jo bhi tha jo buyleads ja bhi raha hai aapne usme not relevant mark kar diya. Abhi IndiaMART ka portal open hai aapka?
Customer: Haan haan portal off hai.
Executive: Open hai isme kya dikkat aaya tha matlab kuch buylead jo aapka main dekh rahi hu yaha se jo aapne not relevant mark kiya hai kya issue aa raha tha sir? Matlab wo aapke kaam ka nahi hai aapne ye mark kiya hai.
Customer: Hum to isme pila pila colour ka ek to star hai.
Executive: Haan. Ye tha Habra se tha super super me water tank.
Customer: Na wo sab na supreme ye sab haan supreme karke water tank jo hai supreme water tank supreme water tank ye sara aapne not relevant matlab ye aapke kaam ka buylead nahi hai?
Customer: Na.
Executive: To sir isko not relevant nahi mark karna hota hai na isko aap bas consume hi mat kijiye Habra se Nalanda se Ramgarh ye sare Hugli se supreme mein aap deal nahi karte hain?
Customer: Na.
Executive: Sir isko okay to isko na mera only RCC product hai.
Customer: RCC water tank.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To RCC water tank to aapka product mein add bhi nahi hai sir. Uska buylead consume kar rahe but add nahi hai RCC water tank isko add karna hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Okay aur kaun kaun se area mein deal karte hain aap? Asansol mein aap West Bengal ya Bihar Jharkhand?
Customer: West Bengal Bihar Jharkhand Odisha.
Executive: West Bengal Bihar Jharkhand Odisha okay. To ye teen char jagah to isko ek minute sir.
Executive: Wait. Thik hai but wo jo aapne waha pe jo bhi cheeze kiya hai na abhi aapka.
Executive: Aap apna ek baar mail ID open kijiyega sir.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Boliye. Uspe ek mail gaya hai aapko Santika video meeting with team IndiaMART.
Customer: Mail bhejenge?
Executive: Haan mail ID pe ek mail gaya hoga aapka mail ID ye jo hai isme mail aaya hoga na ji? Haan mail aaya hoga video meeting ka video meeting with team IndiaMART ke naam se.
Customer: Haan ek baar mail hum dekhte rahiye.
Executive: Haan ek baar mail open aram se koi dikkat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Main open kiya. Haan usme dekhiye aapke paas ek mail gaya hai video meet with team IndiaMART team.
Executive: Santika Kumari ke naam se mil gaya hoga.
Customer: Haan mil gaya hai. Haan usko open kijiyega.
Customer: Open kiya hai. Usme kya kya option dikha raha hai sir open karne ke baad?
Customer: Inviting from the unknown service video meeting with IndiaMART team.
Executive: Haan usme na aap join now ka dekhiye aapko.
Customer: Join now?
Executive: Haan. Click karenge? Haan uspe click kijiye join now pe.
Customer: Haan kar diya.
Executive: Join ho gaya hai. Nahi hua hai sir.
Customer: Dismiss ho gaya.
Executive: Dismiss nahi kijiye join karna hai rukiye phir se bhejte hai tab.
Executive: Dismiss ho gaya?
Customer: Nahi hua hai sir dismiss aap phir se usme join kijiye.
Executive: Dismiss ho ja raha hai ka hai wo?
Executive: Kya kya option kya kya dikha raha hai aap wo bataiye.
Executive: Rukiye aapka ye number WhatsApp pe hai aapka?
Customer: Haan WhatsApp mein to hai.
Executive: Rukiye main WhatsApp pe share kar rahi hu sir call kaat ke kar rahi hu phir main aapko call karti hu.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked valid buyleads as not relevant.

- Customer is not receiving calls.

- Customer wants to add RCC water tank to product list.



Resolution:

- Executive explained not to mark valid buyleads.

- Executive offered to add RCC water tank to product list.

- Executive sent a video meeting link to customer's email.

- Executive will share the link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after sharing link on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, not relevant, rcc water tank, whatsapp
